logCategories.name: Trusted CAs
logCategories.description: Log PingFederate and JRE trusted CAs when they are loaded.

logCategories.name: XML Signatures
logCategories.description: Debug logging for XML signature operations.

logCategories.name: HTTP Request Headers
logCategories.description: Log HTTP request headers. Sensitive information, such as passwords, may be logged when this category is enabled.

logCategories.name: HTTP Request Parameters
logCategories.description: Log HTTP GET request parameters. Sensitive information, such as passwords, may be logged when this category is enabled.

logCategories.name: REST Data Store Requests and Responses
logCategories.description: Log REST datastore requests and responses. Sensitive information, such as passwords, may be logged when this category is enabled.
